name: Save It (Ryan036)
description: Hark is a man against the world, he tries to ruin the lives of everyone, and he is building a machine that'll cause great pain, but before he completes it, he decides to change it so that his mind goes elsewhere, to a new place. And his own body would be taken over, to deal with the problems that he should be facing. You can choose whether or not to finish what he started....
